page.title: 13HOUSING
page.content: About 70% of the houses in our area are{privately owned}while the other 30% are{Council property.} The majority of houses are between 10 and 50 years old, 12% less than 10 years old and 9% over 50 years. Every house has indoor sanitation. 80% have a garage which shows our reliance on the motor car. The majority of houses are built of brick with a tile roof. The most usual style of building is the semi-detached house representing 44% of the total, 19% are detached, 14% terraced (now sometimes called town houses), 12% are single storeyed or bungalows, 8% flats of three storeys or more and 3% are two storeyed flats and maisonettes. There are two caravan sites for {itinerant families.
